title: transgender crossdress fiction 06.09
description:
AUTO LOAN

If you're going to make a loan to a friend, make sure he can repay it. That's the lesson Charlie learns. His wife tells him that if he can't get his money back from his friend, he will have to be punished. His punishment: adding an article of feminine clothing every week he doesn't get a check from his debtor. Soon, thanks to his deadbeat friend, Charlie finds himself going to work in dresses and heels with full makeup and jewelry. Charlie is humiliated but, strangely, his wife doesn't seem to mind the new him.

CROSSDRESSED FOR LIFE

Samuel is a boy, a pretty boy. When his Mom asks him to dress up like a girl to help a friend out with a show that's short a girl, no one could predict what path that would put him on. The lure of femininity proves too strong for Samuel, who slowly, perhaps inevitably, becomes Samantha. Samantha finds herself at a crossroads; should she continue to take hormones and have surgery to become a full woman or stay as a male who lives as a female?

Little did he know that Cynthia had plans for her delicate husband, plans that called for him to become more and more feminine over time. Even stranger is the way RogerÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s mother doesnÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢t seem to mind watching as her son becomes his wifeÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s maid. She even assists Cynthia in turning Roger into petite Tiffany.

KNICKERS

Rob is a real man's man, a love 'em and leave 'em kind of guy. Unfortunately, he makes the mistake of loving and leaving a few of his female coworkers and his boss takes exception to his bad boy behavior. She knows she has him where she wants him and she extracts her revenge by slowly turning him from he-man to she-girl.

MANNEQUIN FOR LIFE

Danny is a young man with no family, on his own in the world. He takes a job in the stock department of a local store. When his boss needs a female model for a fashion show, Danny is reluctantly pressed into service. What was supposed to be a one-time thing becomes a regular assignment. As Danny discovers that he doesn't dislike being Danielle and that the money is much better than working in the back, room, a new lifestyle begins to emerge.

MITCHELLÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢S SWITCH

MitchellÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s sister was grounded, so he agreed to help her sneak out for the evening. All he had to do was stay in her room, but events spiraled out of control. Now heÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s stuck living her life, and just as bad, sheÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s stuck living his! Only Briana Vermont could create a plot this twisted, but can even she get them back to their own lives Eight illustrations.

PETTICOATED FOR LIFE

Did you ever wonder about the people who enter the Witness Protection Program How exactly do the authorities hide them from the bad guys trying to kill them After a gang tries to kill him and his parents, Nathan Mayer discovers that sometimes the best way for a boy to ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œdisappearÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ is for him to become a girl. Over time, he discovers that being Nancy is much more enjoyable than being Nathan.

SECOND LIFE

Philosophers have pondered whether life imitates art or art imitates art for centuries. For Bob, it's the former; he reluctantly agrees to play a female part in a play his wife is directing. Circumstances conspire to keep him in dresses until he finds himself living as a woman 247. Luckily, his wife loves Linda every bit as much as she loved BobÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½even more, perhaps.

SECRETARY FOR LIFE

All Carl wanted was a decent job. To that end, he was willing to put up with a lot, even being asked to make some ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œunusualÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ changes in his appearance by his new employer. Little did he know that he wasnÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢t the first (or the last) young man with delicate features to be hired by WalworthÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s department store. The owner, Ms. Walworth and her management team have some unusual job requirements for their new sissyboy hires, including surgical changes.

SINCE DAD PASSED AWAY

A mother's demand for her son to spend time wearing her clothes leads to both of them finding boyfriends. While he resents feminization, there are aspects with rewards. Neighbors are surprised to find his mother socializing with a "niece" who sometimes passes as his mother's "daughter."

THE TEMP

Eager to make a career change, Kit doesn't realize what other changes his new boss Michelle Bradley has in store for him, as she plunges her unsuspecting new employee deeper into the soft embrace of femininity. In this enigmatic tale of denial and seduction, The Temp wants to do what he can to please the boss so that she will give him full-time work, but he didn't count on dress codes being as part of his job description, or that his pre-employment physical would be conducted by a man-hating gynecologist.

TRIUMVIRATE

With employment in the area at what amounted to a near standstill, Billy finds himsel reassigned to a new office staff position under Anne Maxton. Billy is surprised to be offered a very special position as Dorothy Houston's private secretary... but the surprises are just beginning! Three powerful women will work together to transform his life in every possible way.

WHO AM I WHAT AM I

Artie was the quiet type, shy with girls. He just wanted to earn a living in the office and not make waves. When Joe Dobson decided to harass the office girls, though, he through a monkey wrench into Artie's simple plans. Artie is recruited to become a girl to trap Joe. If it had only stopped there, things could have gone back to normal. That's not to be, though, as one thing leads to another and before he knows what's happening, Artie, as Tess, finds himherself engaged to an up-and-coming Member of Parliament.

YOU COULD BE A MOTHER, TOO!

How could Mark Bowmann's perfect life go sour What circumstances could bring him to work in a daycare center Could his life as a nursing mother be more rewarding.
